participant_1.background:
My dad was a cop and my wife just left me
i drive a fast sports car.
I like to read to my baby, so there's always a book in her nursery.
Since my new job is physically demanding, I try to go for a walk every day.
I cherish my Kesha concert ticket stub.

participant_2.background:
My car is my most valued possession because it allows me to travel to and from work and to enjoy my favorite pastime, watching sports.
i can also squat 400 pounds.
I enjoy making things for my family.
i live in texas.
i am allergic to dust.

content.text: Hi! I just got a new job and it's really physically demanding, so I've been trying to go for a walk every day.
Sounds like a good idea! I love to stay active, too. What's your favorite way to stay in shape?
I like to go to the gym, but I've also been taking my daughter for walks in her stroller.
That's awesome! I love spending time with my family, too.
What's your favorite thing to do with your family?
We love to go to the park and play games. We also love to go camping.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I miss camping.
You should come with us sometime! We'd love to have you.
Great! We'll have to plan a trip soon.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, watch movies, and go to concerts.
Me too! I love going to concerts. I've seen Kesha a few times.
That's awesome! I love Kesha, too. I saw her in concert last year.
Did you have a good time?
I did! It was a great show.
